meanings.sent1: I love tostados with my soup for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious tostados with salsa.
meanings.sent3: The tostados were so crispy, they sounded like music.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a warm tostados on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The tostados were like little pieces of sunshine on my plate.

meanings.definition: A dish made with toasted tortillas, typically topped with beans, cheese, and other ingredients.
meanings.sent1: Mom made tostados for dinner, and they were amazing.
meanings.sent2: The tostados at the party were a big hit.
meanings.sent3: The tostados looked like tiny edible hats.
meanings.sent4: The tostados were a colorful mosaic of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The tostados were a delicious mountain of goodness.

meanings.definition: The act of toasting or grilling tortillas.
meanings.sent1: The tostados required careful toasting to get just right.
meanings.sent2: His specialty was the perfect tostados every time.
meanings.sent3: The tostados were so popular, they had their own fan club.
meanings.sent4: The tostados sizzled on the grill like a summer symphony.
meanings.sent5: The tostados were a masterpiece of toasting perfection.
